word_mean: 预防的：用于预防某病发生的

sentence.Network_en: People accused the ministry of failing to take adequate preventive measures.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们谴责该政府部门未能采取足够的预防措施。

sentence.Network_en: The police were able to take preventive action and avoid a possible riot.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方及时采取防范措施，避免了可能发生的骚乱。

sentence.Network_en: The police presented a reactive rather than preventive strategy against crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方对付犯罪的办法，不是事先加以防范，而是事后作出反应。

list.abs: 减少潜在照射概率的措施称为预防（prevention），降低剂量大小或严重程度的措施称为缓减（mitigation）；潜在照射发生前的防护 …

entry.def: Preventive actions are intended to help prevent things such as disease or crime.

example.ex: Too much is spent on expensive curative medicine and too little on preventive medicine...
example.tran: 在昂贵的治疗性药物上花费太多，在预防性药物上的支出则太少。

example.ex: People accused the ministry of failing to take adequate preventive measures.
example.tran: 人们谴责该政府部门未能采取足够的预防措施。

means.word_mean: 1. remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease;
2. any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome
3. an agent or device intended to prevent conception
1. preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease;

sentences.sentence: "the swastika...a very ancient prophylactic symbol occurring among all peoples"- Victor Schultze

auth_sentence.content: Many headaches may be tackled by simple preventive measures.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many headaches may be tackled by simple preventive measures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many headaches may be tackled by simple preventive measures.

auth_sentence.content: Therefore, preventive actions might also be quite different.
auth_sentence.res_content: Therefore, preventive actions might also be quite different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Therefore, preventive actions might also be quite different.

auth_sentence.content: Starting next year, certain preventive care is free.
auth_sentence.res_content: Starting next year, certain preventive care is free.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

sentences.en: This has proved an effective preventive.
sentences.cn: 这种药证明是很有效的预防剂。

sentences.en: The situation brings home to us the need for drastic preventive actions.
sentences.cn: 这种情况使我们深切地感到采取极端的行动是必要的。
